parameters.definition: Maximum amount that can be invested in apartments
Minimum ratio of the money invested in apartments to that in townhouses

description: My family has decided to invest in real estate for the first time. Currently, they have \param{TotalInvestment} to invest, some in apartments and the rest in townhouses. The money invested in apartments must not be greater than \param{MaxApartments}. They have decided that the money invested in apartments must be at least \param{MinInvestmentRatio} as much as that in townhouses. If the apartments earn \param{ProfitRateApts}, and the townhouses earn \param{ProfitRateTH}, how much money should they invest in each to maximize profit?
